entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
